SEARCH
Package domain

Class ArtikelVerwaltung

java.lang.Object
domain.ArtikelVerwaltung
public class ArtikelVerwaltung extends Object
Manages the articles in the EShop, including adding, updates, searching, removing articles , and throwing specific exceptions related to article management.

  • Method Details

    • ArtikelHinzufuegen

      public Artikel ArtikelHinzufuegen(String Bezeichnung, int bestand, float Preis, boolean istMassenartikel, int packungsGrosse) throws MassengutException
      Adds a new article to the EShop inventory.
      Parameters:
      Bezeichnung - the article name
      bestand - the stock quantity
      Preis - the article price per piece
      istMassenartikel - true if it's a mass article, false otherwise
      packungsGrosse - the packaging size for mass article
      Returns:
      the added article
      Throws:
      MassengutException - if the article quantity and the packaging size are not compatible

    • getArtikelListe

      public List<Artikel> getArtikelListe()
      Retrieves the list of all articles in the EShop.
      Returns:
      a list of articles

    • BestandAendern

      public void BestandAendern(int artikelnummer, int newBestand, int neuePackungsGrosse) throws Exception
      Changes the stock or packaging size of an article.
      Parameters:
      artikelnummer - the article number
      newBestand - the new stock quantity
      neuePackungsGrosse - the new packaging size
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while updating the article stock

    • SucheArtikelPerID

      public Artikel SucheArtikelPerID(int artikelnummer) throws Artikelnichtgefunden
      Searches for an article by its ID.
      Parameters:
      artikelnummer - the article number
      Returns:
      the found article
      Throws:
      Artikelnichtgefunden - if the article is not found

    • articlebestandanderen

      public void articlebestandanderen(Nutzer authuser)
      Updates the article stock after a purchase.
      Parameters:
      authuser - the authenticated user

    • suchemitname

      public List<Artikel> suchemitname(String suchbegriff)
      Searches for articles by name.
      Parameters:
      suchbegriff - the search term
      Returns:
      a list of articles matching the search term

    • loadartikel

      public void loadartikel(String file)
      Loads articles from the txt file into the EShop inventory.
      Parameters:
      file - the file containing articles

    • PackungsGrosseanderen

      public void PackungsGrosseanderen(int artikel, int neuePackungsGrosse) throws Artikelnichtgefunden, PackungsGrosseException
      Changes the packaging size of a mass article.
      Parameters:
      artikel - the article number
      neuePackungsGrosse - the new packaging size
      Throws:
      Artikelnichtgefunden - if the article is not found
      PackungsGrosseException - if the packaging size is invalid

    • checkpackunggrosse

      public void checkpackunggrosse(int anzahl, Artikel artikel) throws PackungsGrosseException
      Checks if the packaging size of an article is valid.
      Parameters:
      anzahl - the quantity
      artikel - the article
      Throws:
      PackungsGrosseException - if the packaging size is invalid

      public void EntferneArtikel(Artikel artikel)
      Removes an article from the EShop inventory.
